sentences.en: My sister was put in charge of the apiary.
sentences.cn: 我姐姐被派去负责养蜂场.

sentences.en: The removals of the supers and the honey extraction operations are recorded in the apiary register.
sentences.cn: 蜂蜜的收获等生产活动都记录在养蜂场登记簿中。

sentences.en: These requirements rule for all apiary sites, including migration sites.
sentences.cn: 这些规定是蜂房所在地必须满足的条件, 迁移地也是一样.

sentences.en: We went to an apiary and got real sheets of used bees wax.
sentences.cn: 我们去了一个养蜂场，得到真正的张用于蜜蜂蜡。

trans.tran_en: a place where bees are kept, usually in beehives
